ModuleDescription: Each student selects a topic for research and works under the supervision of a member of the teaching staff. The research work is presented as a thesis for examination. The Honours Thesis carries an equivalent weight of three modules. Please register PL4401 manually with the Department.
Prerequisite:
Cohort 2015 and before:
Completed 110 MCs, including 60 MCs of PL major requirements, with a minimum CAP of 3.50. Cohort 2016 onwards:
Completed 110 MCs, including 44 MCs of PL major requirements, with a minimum CAP of 3.50.
